backgrounds.name: Acolyte
backgrounds.description: You spent your life in service to a temple, learning the ways of the divine.

backgrounds.name: Charlatan
backgrounds.description: You are a master of deception, using your skills to manipulate others for your benefit.

backgrounds.name: Criminal
backgrounds.description: You have a history of breaking the law and thriving in the underworld of crime.

backgrounds.name: Entertainer
backgrounds.description: You have delighted audiences with your performances, bringing joy to those who watch.

backgrounds.name: Folk Hero
backgrounds.description: A commoner who stood against tyranny and became a local legend.

backgrounds.name: Guild Artisan
backgrounds.description: You are a member of a prestigious craft guild, skilled in your chosen trade.

backgrounds.name: Hermit
backgrounds.description: You lived in seclusion for years, discovering profound truths and self-awareness.

backgrounds.name: Noble
backgrounds.description: You were born into a family of power and influence, accustomed to privilege.

backgrounds.name: Outlander
backgrounds.description: You grew up in the wild, far from civilization, and are at home in nature.

backgrounds.name: Sage
backgrounds.description: You are deeply knowledgeable, having spent years studying and researching.

backgrounds.name: Sailor
backgrounds.description: You spent much of your life on ships, navigating the vast and dangerous seas.

backgrounds.name: Soldier
backgrounds.description: You served in an army, learning discipline, strategy, and the art of war.

backgrounds.name: Urchin
backgrounds.description: You grew up on the streets, relying on cunning and resourcefulness to survive.
